info.name: EarthBound API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for EarthBound application with Direct API calls, Auth Service calls, and Gateway calls

item.name: Direct Calls
item.description: Direct API calls to individual microservices

request.description: Register a new user. Role can be: USER, ADMIN, ORGANIZER, BUSINESS
Refresh access token using refresh token
Get one user by ID (Admin only)
Create a donation for a specific project/entity
Create a Stripe checkout session for payment

item.name: Gateway Calls (Port 3006)
item.description: All requests through the API Gateway - proxied to backend services
